name: Customer PO Lookup
query:
SELECT
    s.customer_po_no AS "Customer PO No:Data:180",
    s.sales_order AS "Sales Order No:Link/Sales Order:180",
    (
        SELECT so.status
        FROM `tabSales Order` so
        WHERE so.name = s.sales_order
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "SO Status:Data:140",
    (
        SELECT so.po_no
        FROM `tabSales Order` so
        WHERE so.name = s.sales_order
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "SO Customer PO No:Data:180",
    s.name AS "Site:Link/Site:180",
    s.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:140"
FROM `tabSite` s
ORDER BY s.name;
